attributes.action: Stop traffic wardens handing out tickets illegally.
attributes.additional_details: Recently I told a traffic warden in Burnley that the lines on Hall Street were illegal. He responded by saying "It's irrelevant" Wardens are over zealous and breaking the law in order to make money for the council. It is breaking the law and there seems to be no one who can bring them to task.
attributes.background: Lancashire County Council issued me with 2 over 11 years, both were challenged and cancelled because of illegal road markings. Traffic wardens are trained in the law. If they are trained then they know the lines are illegal and are committing fraud when they issue tickets. It is a money making scam.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

If you have already complained to the council, and you are not satisfied with the response, the Local Government Ombudsman may be able to advise you:

http://www.lgo.org.uk/
